text.text_translated: Some bridges fall down. It is a secret why they fall down. Engineers study these bridges. After that, they find the secret. Maybe the building material was bad quality. Or a main part of the bridge was broken. Sometimes, the bridge was built for a certain weight. It could not hold more.
